hikes.title: Pup Creek Falls
hikes.description: Climb an easy 1,000 feet above the Clackamas River to a three-tiered waterfall that rivals almost anything in Maui.

hikes.title: Short Sands Beach
hikes.description: Stroll through Giant Sitka spruce to craggy coastal views, then climb into old-growth forest and wild meadows.

hikes.title: Wildwood Trail
hikes.description: Roam dense forests and lush ravines on this 6.4-mile trek just minutes from downtown Portland.
